data.name: About_Introduction
data.value: Hello! I'm Dalibor and my current job is an Business Consultant. I try to keep our customers happy, and our developers sane.

data.name: H2_Experience
data.value: Experience

data.name: ECMBusinessConsultantText
data.value: Consulting in the scope of office digitization and getting rid of paper processes in companies. Digitization includes automatic extraction of data from documents, integration with internal systems customer and possibly also the introduction of new systems, such as the document management systems (DMS. Use of agile methodologies, but also of waterfall. Close cooperation with the customer and internal teams, such as the development department, when creating development assignments and business analyses. Consulting also includes customer training for working with new implemented systems.

data.name: MonetaAnalystText
data.value: Creating reports using tools such as Microsoft Excel, SQL (Oracle), Microsoft Access, PowerBI and SAS BI. Part of the job also was creating process analysis for commercial (SMB) backoffice, with a focus on the RWA (risk-weighted asset) commercial process.

data.name: MonetaEndUserServicesText
data.value: Support of internal end users by phone, email and other channels. Working with the ticketing system, escalating important issues and also a bit of programming. Here I gradually started to learn mainly VBScript with macros in Microsoft Excel.

data.name: AsusTechnicianText
data.value: Repairing motherboards of all kinds on micro level. Soldering, measuring (with oscilloscope), and of course reading in motherboard schematics.

data.name: H2_Education
data.value: Education

data.name: HighSchoolNaJizdarne
data.value: High School of Electrical Engineering, Ostrava, Na Jízdárně

data.name: MaturityDiploma
data.value: GCE Advanced Level

data.name: Skills_SoftwareAndPlatforms
data.value: Software and platform experience (implementation, customization)

data.name: Skills_ProgrammingLangAndTools
data.value: Programming Languages & Tools

data.name: AsusTechnicianDate
data.value: October 2014 - April 2017

data.name: MonetaEndUserServicesDate
data.value: July 2017 - August 2018

data.name: ECMBusinessConsultantDate
data.value: April 2020 - Present

data.name: InterestsText
data.value: Let's say I'm a really active person, although I really hate running. I (really) like just lifting heavy things in the gym. Hiking is my kind of thing too. Other things I do in my free time include playing video games, coding stuff for fun and eating food.

data.name: MonetaAnalystDate
data.value: September 2018 - March 2020

data.name: Skills_Introduction
data.value: Of course there's a lot to cover. As an business consultant I touched almost everything, from Windows Servers, through IIS configuration to pieces of code. Below are just the most noteworthy mentions.

data.name: Skills_SoftwareAndPlatformsText
data.value: I have experience with these software and platforms both in implementation and in customization of solutions for our customers. Integration with other related systems is also a part of my experience. In my career, I have also encountered a wide range of ERP systems such as Dynamics 365 Business Central, Helios Green, Karat! etc.

data.name: Skills_Other
data.value: Other

data.name: HighSchoolNaJizdarneText
data.value: Mechanical and electrical engineering - computer and security systems

data.name: Cert_LinkedIn
data.value: You can find current certifications on my LinkedIn profile.
